name: Well Wishes
description:
Well Wishes is an arena survival game for up to 4 players! Collect coins and toss them in the wishing well. Roll over the side of the well to fall in and spend your collected cash on upgrades. How long can you and your friends survive?

Well Wishes REQUIRES XInput controllers to play. Wired Xbox 360 controllers work great, and the controls will be listed with this gamepad in mind. Well Wishes is no longer in active development, so no further input methods will be added.

Controls:

  • Move: Left stick
  • Roll: Right stick
  • Attack: Right trigger
  • Get up: A
  • Switch to bow/sword (once upgraded): Y
  • Throw bomb (once upgraded): B
  • Shoot magic arrow (once upgraded): X
  • Pause: Start
  • Reset Game: Enter
  • Quit: Esc
